definition: Bristol port city in southwest England
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

pinyin: Bu4 li3 si1 tuo1 er3 Hai3 xia2

sentences.english: The pro rowers from Bristol usually row in a mixed four team.
sentences.chinese: 来自亲赛艇运动员布里斯托尔通常排在混合四队。

sentences.english: Bristol is in the west of England.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托尔位于英兰西。

sentences.english: They went up the Severn from Bristol to Gloucester.
sentences.chinese: 他们向塞文河上游驶去，从布里斯托尔港到格洛斯特。

sentences.english: The University of Bristol scientists uncovered the claw near Prum, Germany. It's approximately 400 million years old.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托尔大学的科学家们在德国珀拉附近发现了它。

sentences.english: We used to live in Bristol but now we live in London.
sentences.chinese: 本人们畴前住在布里斯托尔，但如今住在伦敦。

sentences.english: The Bristol University investigators say a precautionary approach is needed.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托尔大学研究人员们认为预防措施是必要的。

sentences.english: We'll start early and make for Bristol by lunch time.
sentences.chinese: 我们将早早出发，午饭前朝布里斯托尔前进。

sentences.english: Little tyke fell asleep as we were flying over Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 当我们飞过布里斯托尔时那小孩睡着了。
第七章去布里斯托尔途中。

sentences.english: Sarah says something, Bristol is going to follow.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉说什么，布里斯托尔都照做。

sentences.english: That great red orb now sinking down towards the bristol channel.
sentences.chinese: 此时正向布里斯托尔海峡坠落的那一轮巨大红日。

sentences.english: It is an industrial port on Swansea Bay, an inlet of the Bristol Channel.
sentences.chinese: 是布里斯托尔海峡的小海湾斯旺西湾的一个工业港口。

sentences.english: You daren't show face in Bristol after this. '
sentences.chinese: 你这次事成之后肯定不敢再在布里斯托尔露面了。

sentences.english: During the summer he works as a fisherman at the Bristol Bay commercial salmon fishery.
sentences.chinese: 夏天时就在布里斯托尔湾的鲑鱼养殖场打工捕鱼。

definition: Coventry city in West Midlands 西米德蘭茲|西米德兰兹[Xi1 mi3 de2 lan2 zi1], UK
Bradford, city in West Yorkshire, England
Aberdeen (city on east coast of Scotland)
Manchester/also written 曼徹斯特|曼彻斯特
